content: Hi! I'm trying to add multiple languages in a Dataverse installation (V5.14)... Everything works fine with French Language, but Dataverse is showing a mix between English and Spanish everytime I chose one of those languages.
Any Idea on how to fix this?
My guess is that we need someone to add a Spanish translation for 5.14.
When you see English, it's probably new strings that have been added recently.

I believe @Juan has been adding Spanish translations, from looking at https://github.com/GlobalDataverseCommunityConsortium/dataverse-language-packs/commits/develop/es_ES

He might know more. :grinning:

Hi @Juan López , @Philip Durbin.
Last Spanish translated version is for Dataverse v5.10.1.
We will probably update our installation and the Spanish translation to the future Dataverse 6.2 by the end of May. I can help if you want to create a more updated translation before, or you need to translate concrete words of sentences.
Thanks, @Juan ! :heart:
Allright, thank you very much @Juan I'll be waiting for that update!
Juan López has marked this topic as resolved.
